properties.template:
Add a new dialogue example for **{character.name}**

```
{text}
```

properties.instructions: Add a new dialogue example for a character.

examples.instructions: Create a dialogue example showing Detective Rivera questioning a witness about a crime they observed. Include her direct, no-nonsense speaking style and her habit of tapping her pen impatiently when people hesitate to answer. Show how she uses strategic pauses and pointed questions to get information.

properties.name: instructions
properties.instructions: Specific and concise instructions to the writer on what the dialogue example should provide. Ask for spoken dialogue as well as actions show-casing mannerisms of the character.

properties.name: index
properties.instructions: The numeric index of the dialogue example to be removed.

properties.name: character_name
properties.instructions: The exact character name as it is known internally by the system.
Remove existing dialogue example for a character.

properties.template: There was no dialogue example at `{path}` to be removed. No action taken.

properties.name: instructions
properties.instructions:
Specific and concise instructions to the writer on how to update the character's acting instructions.

When modifying the existing acting instructions, be specific about what information to keep or remove.

When replacing the acting instructions entirely, provide enough context so the writer can create a complete new set of acting instructions for the character.

properties.name: character_name
properties.instructions: The exact character name as it is known internally by the system.
Update the acting instructions for a character.

examples.instructions: Update Sarah's acting instructions to instruct her to speak less formally and without so much purple prose.

properties.name: replace
properties.instructions: If you want to replace the acting instructions entirely, set to `true`. If you just want to make modifications to existing acting instructions, set to `false`.

properties.content:
The purpose of dialogue / acting examples is to provide a broader guidance on how a character would speak or act in certain situations.

They must not be based on the current scene progression (unless the instructions explicitly ask for this).

It is strongly recommended to instruct the writer to also include actions showcasing the character's mannerisms in addition to spoken dialogue.

properties.name: character_name
properties.instructions: The exact character name as it is known internally by the system.
